bill_title: distribute a portion of tourism promotion funds to the special racing revolving fund and the South Dakota-bred racing fund.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to distribute a portion of tourism promotion funds to the special racing revolving fund and the South Dakota-bred racing fund. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 1-52 be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: Five percent of the amount transferred to the tourism promotion fund under § 42-7B-48 shall be distributed to the South Dakota-bred racing fund, and five percent of the amount transferred to the tourism promotion fund under § 42-7B-48 shall be distributed to the special racing revolving fund. The distributions under this section may only be distributed if sports betting is authorized in the state. 100 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.167 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
